meanings.sent2: The cookie was so biteable that I couldn't resist taking a nibble.

meanings.definition: Able to be easily bitten into or chewed
meanings.sent1: The ripe peach was very biteable.
meanings.sent2: The fresh baguette was so biteable that it practically melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was so biteable that I couldn't help but devour it.
meanings.sent4: The ripe apple was biteable like a juicy treat.
meanings.sent5: The tender steak was incredibly biteable and flavorful.
